nodes.bodyText:
@simonbasle these tests were triggered by a chain (check -> testStaticInit -must-run-after-> loops) but now they are not executed at all.
Consider adding dependsOn(loops) to check's config

it's there, conditional on the version being a .RELEASE (loops are just calling normal single-run tests in big loops btw). the mustRunAfter was there so that static init test was guaranteed to be ordered first, then the other tests would run (so that they don't reset the hook by running before the staticInitTest) 👍
